title: [Slither Creek, South Bank]
description: Just downstream, the creek empties into a small lake.  Cattails grow at the edge of the water, waving in a slight breeze, and jewel-hued dragonflies dart about the pool.  Although the banks are marshy, they look stable enough to support you, giving you safe access to the creek.

Just downstream, the creek empties into a small lake.  Cattails grow at the edge of the water, waving in a slight breeze, and you hear insects darting about the pool.  Although the banks are marshy, they look stable enough to support you, giving you safe access to the creek.
